addr: Carnival Miracle. Port of Long Beach. Long Beach, CA 90802
title: Hawaiian Cruise with Quilting the Kaye Wood Way
desc: Quilt and cruise across the Pacific from LA to Hawaii. Kaye Wood, host of PBS-TV Kaye's Quilting Friends, will teach classes featuring her original quiltmaking techniques. She will be joined by Veronica Cox, Bear Thread Designs. $2599 ?includes all supplies including Janome Sewing Machines and a pre-cruise night aboard the Queen Mary. Call Rockport Tours ? 888-937-3488. A small deposit will hold your space. For class information, email Kaye ? kaye@kayewood.com.
